name: SeeMyOrb GMTK 2022
description:
Friendly note: This game was not made by english speakers and may contain bad grammar or errors in punctuation.

If you find anything of the sort, we're sorry for that.

Friendly Note 2: 

See My Orb is our team's first game and may not be up to quality standards.

Credits:

Wabaano: Base idea, coding, pixel art.

NAN: Pixel art, translation to english.

Sgoc: Testing, Pixel art, Sound.

Our pets: Motivation.

KYAAA Skadi: Motivation.
